entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 07:28 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 5.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except snow inland early this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming south 50 gusting to 70 this morning. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Rain with risk of thundershowers. Fog patches. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. Temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
